title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practice Competencies: Survey-Based Instructional Design Workflow for Enhancing Online Learning Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Experience utilizing basic online learning tools (e.g., Google Forms)
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design at least five survey items to evaluate the effectiveness of online learning.
Learners can identify three barriers to online learning by analyzing case studies of Indonesian teachers.
Learners can restructure instructional materials by applying two microlearning design strategies optimized for mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
